message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500. I believe it's a fair price considering its value and rarity.
Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the value you've placed on this product, my budget for it is $9000. Would you be willing to come down to that price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $9200. This is the lowest price I'm comfortable with, considering the product's value and rarity.
